name: flickr.groups.search
description: Search for groups. 18+ groups will only be returned for authenticated calls where the authenticated user is over 18.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: per_page
arguments.description: Number of groups to return per page. If this argument is ommited, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is ommited, it defaults to 1.

response:
<groups page="1" pages="14" perpage="5" total="67">
  <group id="3000@N02" nsid="3000@N02" name="Frito's Test Group" eighteenplus="0" />
  <group id="32825757@N00" nsid="32825757@N00" name="Free for All" eighteenplus="0" />
  <group id="33335981560@N01" nsid="33335981560@N01" name="joly's mothers" eighteenplus="0" />
  <group id="33853651681@N01" nsid="33853651681@N01" name="Wintermute tower" eighteenplus="0" />
  <group id="33853651696@N01" nsid="33853651696@N01" name="Art and Literature Hoedown" eighteenplus="0" />
</groups>

errors.title: No text passedThe required text argument was ommited.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
Write operation failedThe requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
